name: Convert Units
description:
Convert between different units of measurement. Supports length, weight, temperature, volume, speed, and area conversions.

Supported categories:
- Length: m, km, cm, mm, mi, yd, ft, in
- Weight: kg, g, mg, lb, oz, ton, st
- Temperature: C, F, K
- Volume: L, mL, gal, qt, pt, cup, fl_oz, tbsp, tsp, m3, cm3
- Speed: mph, kph, m/s, ft/s, knot
- Area: sq_m, sq_km, sq_cm, sq_ft, sq_in, sq_mi, acre, hectare

Features:
- High-precision conversions using standard formulas
- Cached conversion formulas for performance
- Support for decimal precision
- Common conversion presets (baking, distance, weight)
- Bidirectional conversions

** EXAMPLES **

1. Convert length:
{
  "value": 100,
  "from": "ft",
  "to": "m"
}

2. Convert temperature:
{
  "value": 98.6,
  "from": "F",
  "to": "C",
  "precision": 1
}

3. Batch convert to multiple units:
{
  "value": 1,
  "from": "cup",
  "toUnits": ["mL", "tbsp", "tsp", "fl_oz"]
}

4. Common baking conversions:
{
  "value": 2,
  "from": "cup",
  "preset": "baking"
}

to.description: Target unit (same category as source). Omit to use preset or toUnits.

toUnits.description: Array of target units for batch conversion

preset.description: Use common conversion preset (automatically determines toUnits)
